title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, goals, and requirements for the ContainerSecurityScanner tool. Gather input from stakeholders and subject matter experts.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, integration points, and security considerations. The architecture should be modular, scalable, and maintainable, with a focus on security best practices for containerized applications.

title: Define Security Scanning Mechanisms
description: Research and define the security scanning mechanisms and techniques to be used for container scanning. This should include both static analysis and dynamic analysis techniques, as well as any relevant industry standards or best practices.

title: Design User Interface and Experience
description: Design the user interface and experience for the ContainerSecurityScanner tool, including dashboards, reports, and configurations.

title: Define Data Storage and Retrieval Mechanisms
description: Design the data storage and retrieval mechanisms for storing and accessing scan results, configurations, and other relevant data.

title: Define Deployment and Orchestration Strategies
description: Design the deployment and orchestration strategies for the ContainerSecurityScanner tool, including containerization, scaling, monitoring, and disaster recovery.
